description: "The arrows on this map mark the direction of the seasonal monsoons experienced around the Sunda and Maluku Islands (mainly modern Indonesia) during the late 18th century. Each arrow has a label in French, indicating the month."
title: "Carte des isles de la Sonde et des isles Moluques / par M. Bonne, Ingénieur Hydrographe de la Marine ; André sculp."
